title: DockerFile build is Failing
body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/discussions/6512
Originally posted by **nov301996** August 19, 2022 Hi Guys, The Docker Build is getting failed with the below error, Please have a look at this issue. 8 78.80 Setting up gpg-wks-server (2.2.19-3ubuntu2.2) ... #8 78.80 Setting up zlib1g-dev:amd64 (1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu1.3) ... #8 78.81 Setting up cpp (4:9.3.0-1ubuntu2) ... #8 78.82 Setting up cmake (3.16.3-1ubuntu1) ... #8 78.82 Setting up libmysqlclient-dev (8.0.30-0ubuntu0.20.04.2) ... #8 78.83 Setting up default-libmysqlclient-dev:amd64 (1.0.5ubuntu2) ... #8 78.83 Setting up gcc-9 (9.4.0-1ubuntu1~20.04.1) ... #8 78.84 Setting up libstdc++-9-dev:amd64 (9.4.0-1ubuntu1~20.04.1) ... #8 78.85 Setting up gpg-wks-client (2.2.19-3ubuntu2.2) ... #8 78.85 Setting up gcc (4:9.3.0-1ubuntu2) ... #8 78.87 Setting up libprotobuf-dev:amd64 (3.6.1.3-2ubuntu5) ... #8 78.87 Setting up g++-9 (9.4.0-1ubuntu1~20.04.1) ... #8 78.89 Setting up g++ (4:9.3.0-1ubuntu2) ... #8 78.90 update-alternatives: using /usr/bin/g++ to provide /usr/bin/c++ (c++) in auto mode #8 78.90 update-alternatives: warning: skip creation of /usr/share/man/man1/c++.1.gz because associated file /usr/share/man/man1/g++.1.gz (of link group c++) doesn't exist #8 78.91 Setting up gnupg (2.2.19-3ubuntu2.2) ... #8 78.91 Setting up build-essential (12.8ubuntu1.1) ... #8 78.92 Processing triggers for libc-bin (2.31-0ubuntu9.9) ... #8 79.53 Collecting package metadata (current_repodata.json): ...working... failed #8 86.68 #8 86.68 CondaHTTPError: HTTP 000 CONNECTION FAILED for url #8 86.68 Elapsed: - #8 86.68 #8 86.68 An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL. #8 86.68 HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way. #8 86.68 'https//conda.anaconda.org/conda-forge/linux-64' #8 86.68 #8 86.68 ------ executor failed running [/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y default-libmysqlclient-dev build-essential curl cmake protobuf-compiler && conda install python=3.7 charset-normalizer=2.0.12 && pip install -r requirements/dev-requirements.txt --no-cache-dir && pip install --no-cache-dir -e . && mkdir -p /usr/share/man/man1 && apt-get install -y openjdk-11-jre-headless]: exit code: 1
